meanings.definition: Having a true coelom, a body cavity lined by mesoderm.
meanings.sent1: The coelomate organism has a well-developed body cavity.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the coelomate structure of the organism.
meanings.sent3: The coelomate creature threw a party in its spacious body cavity.
meanings.sent4: The coelomate design of the building allowed for efficient airflow.
meanings.sent5: The coelomate feature of the car ensured ample storage space.

meanings.definition: An animal with a coelom, such as a vertebrate or an annelid.
meanings.sent1: The coelomate was identified as a vertebrate by the biologist.
meanings.sent2: The zoo showcased various coelomates from different habitats.
meanings.sent3: The coelomate joked with the invertebrates about their lack of body cavity.
meanings.sent4: The coelomate stood out among the other animals in the exhibit.
meanings.sent5: The coelomate's body cavity provided protection from external threats.
